ThingDef.label: ursine genome
ThingDef.description: A payload of ursine genetic material. Can be used at the genomorpher to create a growth cell of a hybrid animal. This tier 1 genome can be used as either a primary or secondary genome.\n\n<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> Can be extracted via the genome extractor table or any genome excavator from:

ThingDef.description: A payload of avian genetic material. Can be used at the genomorpher to create a growth cell of a hybrid animal. This tier 1 genome can be used as either a primary or secondary genome.\n\n<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> Can be extracted via the genome extractor table or any genome excavator from:

This tier 1 genome can be used as either a primary or secondary genome.\n\n<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> Can be extracted via the genome extractor table or any genome excavator from:

ThingDef.label: humanoid genome
ThingDef.description: A payload of humanoid genetic material. Can be used at the genomorpher to create a growth cell of a hybrid animal. This tier 1 genome can be used as either a primary or secondary genome.\n\n<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> Can be extracted via the genome extractor table or any genome excavator from any sentient humanoid.

ThingDef.label: equine genome
ThingDef.description: A payload of equine genetic material. Can be used at the genomorpher to create a growth cell of a hybrid animal. This tier 2 genome can only be used as primary genome.\n\n<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> Can only be extracted via any genome excavator from:

ThingDef.label: insectoid genome
ThingDef.description: A payload of insectoid genetic material. Can be used at the genomorpher to create a growth cell of a hybrid animal. This tier 2 genome can only be used as primary genome.\n\n<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> Can only be extracted via any genome excavator from:

ThingDef.label: reptile genome
ThingDef.description: A payload of reptile genetic material. Can be used at the genomorpher to create a growth cell of a hybrid animal. This tier 2 genome can only be used as primary genome.\n\n<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> Can only be extracted via any genome excavator from:

ThingDef.label: colossal genome
ThingDef.description: A payload of colossal genetic material. Can be used at the genomorpher to create a growth cell of a hybrid animal. This tier 3 genome can only be used as primary genome.\n\n<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> Can only be extracted via an archotech genome excavator from:

ThingDef.label: mechanoid active components
ThingDef.description: A vial of active mechanites from a mechanoid's corpse.

ThingDef.label: template genome
ThingDef.description: Absolutely and completely worthless, but when properly processed alongside an actual genome it can be trimmed down to an identical copy.
